title: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example in Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2 and KDE 2.2, I noticed that the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved, but they do not have any effect. This issue is particularly noticeable when opening a small image such as an icon, as the scrollbars are misleading since they do not do anything.
